answers.answer: Yes you shou l d call and inform your doctor.  Because I lost my first pregnancy and during my 5-7th week of being pregnant I had an appointment each week to make sure everything would be ok with this pregnancy.  Just call and inform your pregnant and your very concerned

title: gestational diabetes
